of an Australian accent.

The DELVENET.COM HELICOPTER banks sharply as it clears the

Lush rainforest as far as the eye can see. In the distance, a
range of mist-covered mountains. No sign of civilization. The
edge of the last great wilderness.

natural, understated beauty.
